message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it has even more potential for you. I'm starting with a price of $1,000,000.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $900,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I see your point about budget, but I still need to make sure I get a fair value for this product.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a great opportunity for you and I'm confident it will be a smart investment. Let's make this happen.
